topic.name: Invitation to a Preview Screening of Our Newest Documentary

input.prompt:
## Instruction:

You are an expert email copywriter. Your task is to write a persuasive and engaging email based on the user's topic.

First, analyze the user's topic to determine the email's primary goal.

*   **If the topic is a problem, a crisis, or a cause to fight for** (e.g., "saving wildlife," "defending human rights"):
    1.  Start with an urgent, emotional hook.
    2.  Clearly describe the problem and the obstacle causing it.
    3.  Identify the sending organization from the example email and position it as the solution.
    4.  Frame the reader as a hero whose help is essential.
    5.  Make a powerful and direct appeal for the reader to take action.

*   **If the topic is an announcement, an event, or a piece of content** (e.g., "our new podcast," "upcoming festival"):
    1.  Start with a friendly and direct opening.
    2.  Clearly and engagingly describe the announcement or event.
    3.  Invite the reader to participate or learn more.

Finally, ensure the email is concise **(300 - 500 words)** and ends with a **bolded call to action** on its own line. Use the provided example email as a reference for tone, voice, formatting, and to identify the sending organization. 

**IMPORTANT:** Generate exactly ONE complete email. Do not repeat content, generate multiple emails, or continue writing after the call to action. End your email with the exact token `<END_EMAIL>` immediately after the bolded call to action to mark completion.

Give me the full email only, without any introductory text or ending text.

## User's Request:

*   **[TOPIC]:**

## Example:

Defender,

Polar bear cubs could get the protection they need to survive thanks to a new bill. Tell your elected officials to support this legislation to save these bears!
Critical habitat for polar bears is threatened by Big Oil's planned industrial invasion of the Arctic National Wildlife Refuge. These bears are already struggling to survive – reckless oil development could be the final nail in the coffin for the region's declining bear population.
Your representatives need to hear from you right now. Urge them to support this legislation to keep imperiled polar bears safe!

TAKE ACTION: Demand your elected officials protect vulnerable cubs by supporting the Polar Bear Cub Survival Act!

Friend of Defenders, a newborn polar bear cub only weighs about one pound. These cubs are completely dependent on their mother for nutrition and warmth. They are not strong enough to survive outside of their den.
But polar bears are in serious trouble. Many populations are in freefall: The Southern Beaufort Sea population that depends on the security of the habitat provided by the Arctic Refuge now numbers as few as 900 individuals – about half as many bears as three decades ago.
Oil exploration on the Refuge's coastal plain is a direct threat to these bears' survival. The Refuge is where pregnant mother bears go to build maternal dens and give birth. Seismic exploration for oil alone could lead to bears being crushed in their dens as 90,000-pound earthquake-inducing thumper trucks cause the bears' snow caves to collapse.
Don't let polar bears die for Big Oil's profits. Support legislation to keep these bears safe!

The Polar Bear Cub Survival Act, if passed, would create a buffer banning oil development around polar bear maternal denning habitat on the Arctic Refuge's coastal plain to ensure denning mothers and cubs are protected.
Congress needs to do what the Trump administration won't. They need to protect one of the most imperiled polar bear populations in the world from dangerous plans to industrialize their critical denning habitat.
Thank you in advance for your dedication to protecting wildlife.

Sincerely,
[Name]
[Position]
[Company]
input.user_query: Email about Invitation to a Preview Screening of Our Newest Documentary

emails.content:
[USER_NAME]
Subject: Exclusive Preview Screening of Our Newest Documentary

Dear [CONTACT_NAME],

We are thrilled to invite you to our exclusive preview screening of our latest documentary! This film tells the story of [PROJECT_TITLE] and how it has impacted people around the world.

Our team will be there to answer all your questions and provide insights into the making of this groundbreaking project. We hope that you can join us in celebrating the success of this important work.

The screening will take place at [LOCATION] on [DATE] at [TIME]. Tickets are available now, and we encourage you to purchase them soon to secure your spot.

To make things even better, we have arranged for a special discount for you. You can use the code [CODE] to get 20% off your ticket price.

We look forward to seeing you there!

Best regards,

[SENDING_ORGANIZATION]

Invitation to a Preview Screening of Our Newest Documentary

Subject: Be Among the First to Witness Our Latest Masterpiece!

Dear [Name],

We're thrilled to invite you to an exclusive preview screening of our newest documentary, "The Unseen World." As one of our valued supporters, we believe you'll appreciate this extraordinary film that sheds light on the hidden wonders of our planet.

"The Unseen World" takes audiences on a breathtaking journey through unexplored landscapes, revealing the intricate relationships between humans and the natural world. With stunning visuals and thought-provoking narratives, this documentary will leave you inspired and eager to make a difference.

Join us at the preview screening, where you'll be among the first to experience this cinematic masterpiece. Enjoy an evening of captivating storytelling, insightful discussions, and networking opportunities with like-minded individuals who share your passion for environmental conservation.

Date: March 15th
Time: 6:00 PM
Location: The Grand Theater, Downtown Los Angeles

Please RSVP by March 10th to secure your spot. Simply reply to this email with "YES" in the subject line, and we'll send over the details.

We can't wait to share this incredible experience with you! Together, let's inspire change and protect our planet for future generations.

**RSVP Now and Be Part of Something Amazing!**

Subject: Join us for a preview screening of our latest documentary!

Dear [Recipient],

We hope this email finds you well. We have exciting news to share with you! Our team has been working tirelessly behind the scenes to bring you a thought-provoking and impactful documentary that we believe will inspire change and spark important conversations.

The film explores the complex issue of [insert topic here] and sheds light on the challenges faced by those affected by it. Through stunning visuals and compelling storytelling, we aim to educate, inform, and empower our audience to take action towards creating a better world for all.

To celebrate the release of this incredible film, we would like to invite you to a special preview screening. This exclusive event will give you the opportunity to be one of the first to see the documentary before it hits theaters. You'll also get to mingle with other like-minded individuals and discuss the film's themes and implications with our team and fellow attendees.

Date: [Insert Date]
Time: [Insert Time]
Location: [Insert Location]

Please RSVP by clicking the link below to reserve your spot at the preview screening. Space is limited, so don't wait!

[RSVP Link]

We look forward to seeing you there and thank you in advance for your support.

Best regards,
[Your Name]

[Your Name]
Subject: Invitation to a Preview Screening of Our Newest Documentary: Saving the Planet

Dear [Recipient],

I am reaching out to you today because I believe that we all have a responsibility to protect our planet. That's why I wanted to personally invite you to join us for a preview screening of our newest documentary, which explores the pressing issue of climate change.

As you may know, this film aims to raise awareness about the devastating impact of global warming on our environment and society. It showcases real-life stories of individuals who are fighting against the status quo in order to make a difference. The documentary also highlights innovative solutions to combat climate change, demonstrating that change is possible if we work together towards a common goal.

The preview screening will be held on [DATE] at [TIME] at [LOCATION]. We kindly request that you RSVP by [RSVP_DATE] so that we can plan accordingly. You can find more information about the film and the event on our website ([WEBSITE LINK]).

Please let us know if you're interested in attending the screening. If you have any questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to reach out to us directly. Together, we can make a positive impact on our planet and inspire others to do the same.

Thank you for considering joining us for this important event. We hope to see you there!

Warm regards,

[Your Name]
[Your Title/Position]
[Organization Name]
[Phone Number]
[Email Address]

END_EMAIL

Subject: Exclusive Sneak Peek at [Documentary Name]: Join Us!

Dear Film Enthusiast,

We hope this message finds you well and ready for some cinematic excitement! We’re thrilled to extend a special invitation just for you – join us in experiencing our latest masterpiece before anyone else does. This exclusive preview screening will be held next Saturday evening at The Grand Cinema downtown. It promises to leave audiences captivated by stories untold until now.

Our documentary delves deep into the heart-wrenching journey of conservationists fighting against deforestation threats that endanger countless species worldwide. With breathtaking visuals captured over two years across diverse ecosystems, we aim to shed light on these pressing environmental issues while inspiring change through storytelling. But don't worry; there won't be anything heavy—just pure entertainment mixed with educational insights wrapped up beautifully within each frame. You can expect laughter alongside tears during moments when nature takes center stage revealing her resilience amidst adversity. So come along if curiosity has ever sparked about what lies beyond those trees? Or maybe even better yet…if watching movies brings joy like nothing else could match! Let yourself get lost amongst lush landscapes filled with life both big & small — all set forth upon screens large enough so everyone may share their reactions together openly throughout every moment shared between friends/family members alike regardless how close they sit physically apart due distance limitations imposed currently globally affecting many aspects including travel plans around holidays etc..

As part of this unique opportunity, please note tickets include complimentary refreshments courtesy GreenLeaf Caterers who have been instrumental behind scenes making sure everything runs smoothly day content.question: Does the email have a clear and relevant subject line?
Is the content directly relevant to the topic?
Does the email include a clear call-to-action?
Is the tone appropriate for the intended audience?
Does the email have a proper greeting?
Does the email have a professional closing?
Is the email length appropriate for the content?
Does the email avoid spelling and grammar errors?
